An IPTV + EPG viewer for Tunarr (Plex/Jellyfin) that brings back the ritual of watchingâ€”not scrolling, not seeking, just being with whatâ€™s on.

Like the grain of 35mm film ğŸï¸ or the crackle before a record drops ğŸ’¿, TVx trades sterile perfection for something alive. Curved glass ğŸ“Ÿ. Gentle flicker âœ¨. Scanlines that breathe.

Architecture

TVx is a client-side web frontend that interfaces with your Tunarr backend alongside your Plex library. It consumes M3U playlists and XMLTV EPG data generated by Tunarr, while displaying rich metadata and artwork from your Plex media server.
